org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging
Class AeStructuredDeploymentLog

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeDeploymentLog
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.logging.AeStructuredDeploymentLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBaseErrorReporter, IAeDeploymentLogger
public class AeStructuredDeploymentLog
extends AeDeploymentLog

The structured deployment log breaks up the log messages and creates a structure of deployment info objects from them.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.StringBuffer mBuffer
          A string buffer to hold the log messages.
protected  java.util.HashMap mDeployInfoMap
          A map to hold the deployment info for each PDD.
private  java.lang.StringBuffer mGlobalBuffer
          A global string buffer to hold messages that aren't associated with a single PDD.

createDeploymentInfo

protected IAeDeploymentInfo createDeploymentInfo()
Creates a new deployment info object. This method can be overridden by subclasses in order to supply a new impl of the deployment info object.
